org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.create

Class CreateIndexRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportRequest
      • org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequest<T>
        • org.elasticsearch.action.support.master.MasterNodeOperationRequest<CreateIndexRequest>
          • org.elasticsearch.action.admin.indices.create.CreateIndexRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable

    public class CreateIndexRequest
extends MasterNodeOperationRequest<CreateIndexRequest>
    A request to create an index. Best created with org.elasticsearch.client.Requests#createIndexRequest(String).

    The index created can optionally be created with settings(org.elasticsearch.common.settings.Settings).

    See Also:
    IndicesAdminClient.create(CreateIndexRequest), org.elasticsearch.client.Requests#createIndexRequest(String), CreateIndexResponse
